property.name: xlrServer
property.label: Server
property.description: The XL Release server to connect to.

property.name: username
property.description: Overrides the username used to connect to the server.

property.name: password
property.description: Overrides the password used to connect to the server.

property.name: templateName
property.label: Template Name
property.description: Name of the template from which to create the subrelease.

property.name: releaseTitle
property.label: Release Title
property.description: Name of the newly created subrelease.

property.name: variables
property.description: Comma-separated key-value pairs for the values of variables required by the subrelease, e.g. var1=value1,var2=value2

property.name: asynch
property.description: If [false], the task will wait for the subrelease to finish.

property.name: gateTaskTitle
property.description: Title of the gate task in this release that should wait for the subrelease to complete. Skipped if not specified (blank).

property.name: templateName
property.label: Template Name
property.description: Name of the template to create.

property.name: tags
property.description: Comma-separated list of tags to associate with this template e.g. tag1,tag2.

property.name: templateId
property.description: The ID of the created template.

property.name: phases
property.description: Comma-seperated list of phases to delete

property.name: taskTitle
property.label: Task Title
property.description: Title of the task to get the id for.

property.name: phaseName
property.label: Phase Name to check for running task

property.name: taskName
property.label: Task Name to verify is not running
